name: Commonwealth ex rel. Winchell, Appellant, v. Cavell
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Winchell v. Cavell

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Bbien and Robebts, JJ.
parties: Commonwealth ex rel. Winchell, Appellant, v. Cavell.

opinions.text:
Order
Per Curiam,
Order of the Superior Court affirmed with direction, however, that judgment of sentence be vacated and record remanded. The record is remanded to the Court of Oyer and Terminer of Indiana County solely for the purpose of resentencing Bichard C. Winchell and, at the time of such resentence, counsel for the said - Bichard C. Winchell should be present.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Richard G. Winchell, appellant, in propria persona.
. W. Thomas Malcolm, District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth ex rel. Winchell, Appellant, v. Cavell.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Bbien and Robebts, JJ.
Richard G. Winchell, appellant, in propria persona.
. W. Thomas Malcolm, District Attorney, for appellee.
August 12, 1965:
